page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment within the area is predominantly farming. There are some self employed residents in the villages and the mill at Sheepy Parva employs several people but these are not all from the area. The mill which now deals in animal foods dates back to the 11th centuary and was mentioned along with Sheepy in the 1086 Domesday Book. However the majority of the working population commute to jobs outside the area and so car ownership is a priority. The lack of public transport is a problem especially for the youngsters seeking work or further education.
